programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: Three kayakers fight for their lives when a great white shark traps them on a small, sinking island.

programme.title: Aquarium of the Dead
programme.desc: Aquarium workers must fight to stop undead marine life before they escape into the sea.

programme.title: Shark Week
programme.desc: A group of complete strangers find themselves isolated by a wealthy madman on his island compound.

programme.title: Ice Sharks
programme.desc: As scientists study the effects of climate change on marine life under Arctic ice, a new breed of shark breaks through, forcing the scientists to fight back.

programme.title: Mega Shark Vs Crocosaurus
programme.desc: The massive prehistoric shark has survived the last battle, and a new, dangerous foe is discovered.

programme.title: 2-Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: Survivors of a ship that sunk during their semester at sea try to escape from a two-headed shark.

programme.title: Mega Shark VS Kolossus
programme.desc: Humanity is threatened when a robot is accidentally awakened at the same time as another mega shark.

programme.title: 2025 Armageddon
programme.desc: A militant alien race attacks Earth with monsters and disasters inspired by The Asylum's broadcasts. To survive, Earth's scientists must create new creatures and storms to fight back.

programme.title: The Asylum

programme.title: Sharknado: Feeding Frenzy
programme.desc: What began as another Syfy creature feature has now become an important piece of pop culture - poised to take over the entire world.

programme.title: 6 Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: A marriage boot camp turns into the ultimate test for survival when a 6-headed shark attacks.

programme.title: Devil's Triangle
programme.desc: A group of marine biologists crash land in the Bermuda Triangle.

programme.title: Sharknado
programme.desc: When a freak hurricane swamps Los Angeles, thousands of sharks terrorize the waterlogged populace, and nature's deadliest killer rules sea, land, and air.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: A battle between two prehistoric sea creatures endangers the California coast.
